urls.title: Flood advice and information ‚Äì Rotherham Metropolitan Borough Council
urls.description: When there's flooding in Rotherham, we'll provide assistance, practical support and information as soon as it's safe and appropriate to do so.

tweets.text:
Flood alerts are in place for parts of South Yorks. As a precaution Rotherham Council is taking steps to protect high-risk residential areas.

Make sure you are prepared in the event of flooding and follow @EnvAgency & @EnvAgencyYNE for updates

‚û°Ô∏è https://t.co/EUSqZinZO1 https://t.co/3ZlF0nZets

We are starting to issue #flood alerts for parts of the North West meaning that flooding is possible. 

Are you at risk of flooding? 

For the latest visit ‚ñ∂Ô∏è https://t.co/uGQ4g6A5Xn

Storm Christoph is on its way which means we‚Äôll be activating the #Didsbury part of the Mersey Flood Basin tomorrow morning - joint @ManCityCouncil @EnvAgency for Councillors below: https://t.co/5BmTSyjdxJ

urls.title: Flood information for River Mersey Uplands catchment including Hyde, Ashton-under-Lyne, Denton, Stalybridge and Glossop - GOV.UK
urls.description: Check your risk of flooding: get current flood warnings, river and sea levels, check the 5-day forecast or use flood risk maps

tweets.text:
*** FLOOD ALERT ***

The Environment Agency @EnvAgencyNW have issued a ‚ÄòFlooding is possible - be prepared‚Äô alert for areas iof Tameside. 

More details here:
https://t.co/txKTHfBfAx

Picking up that this could cause significant problems across GM.

Please take precautions everyone, especially those in the areas most at risk.
